name: Leg Raises on Pull-Up Bar
how_to_perform:
1. Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with your hands shoulder-width apart and your body straight.
2. Engage your core by drawing your belly button towards your spine, and lift your legs off the ground, keeping them straight.
3. Raise one leg up towards the ceiling, keeping it fully extended, while maintaining engagement in your core muscles.
4. Pause briefly at the top of the movement with your leg raised high.

5. Slowly lower your raised leg back down to the starting position without touching it to the pull-up bar or letting it swing.

6. Repeat on the other side by raising the opposite leg and following the same procedure.

7. Continue alternating legs, maintaining control throughout each repetition.
short_summary: Leg raises on a pull-up bar are an isolation exercise that targets the abdominal muscles
